title: Miami Dade Transit
summary: A free app for the commuters of the Miami-Dade Transit System
description: If you live in, or are just visiting Miami, you need the Miami-Dade Transit App NOW!!!We have also added Live information on upcoming events in Miami City. Presently we are showing nearest station and the trains arriving/leaving from this station. More features will be added in due course.Get latest updated and LIVE real-time departures from your stations where you will get up-to-the-minute departure timings of the next upcoming train to your destination. The unique point of this app is that you can find out about the various amenities around any station; like Hotels, Hospitals, Banks, ATMs, Restaurants, Theaters, Parking, Gas Stations, Auto Repairs etc. We cover all three modes of commuter traffic Metro Bus, Metro Rail and Metro MoverOther outstanding features of "Miami Dade Transit" are;1. Schedules between any two stations of the network. Just enter the starting and ending stations and you shall get the train options available in the immediate future alongwith the route and map.2. Fare on the Miami Dade Transit system is available for the commuters.3. Get latest up to the minute status at any station. This includes the approximate actual arrival times at the stations4. Amenities around the stations: Get instant access to all the citizen amenities situated around the station of your choice like Hotels, Hospitals, Banks, Restaurants, Theaters, Parking, Gas Stations, Auto Repairs etc.5. Locate the stations nearest to your locations and get instant information on the trains leaving for various destinations.6. Online map of the network - you can see the actual GPS coordinate based map of the network based on the chosen route.Please note that real time departures and schedules are sourced directly from Transit Authority. Accuracy of this information depends on their servers. Please treat this app as a tool to estimate your trip timings and schedule, please do not expect 100% accuracy.
descriptionHTML:
If you live in, or are just visiting Miami, you need the Miami-Dade Transit App NOW!!!

We have also added Live information on upcoming events in Miami City. Presently we are showing nearest station and the trains arriving/leaving from this station. More features will be added in due course.

Get latest updated and LIVE real-time departures from your stations where you will get up-to-the-minute departure timings of the next upcoming train to your destination. The unique point of this app is that you can find out about the various amenities around any station; like Hotels, Hospitals, Banks, ATMs, Restaurants, Theaters, Parking, Gas Stations, Auto Repairs etc. We cover all three modes of commuter traffic Metro Bus, Metro Rail and Metro Mover

Other outstanding features of "Miami Dade Transit" are;

1. Schedules between any two stations of the network. Just enter the starting and ending stations and you shall get the train options available in the immediate future alongwith the route and map.

2. Fare on the Miami Dade Transit system is available for the commuters.

3. Get latest up to the minute status at any station. This includes the approximate actual arrival times at the stations

4. Amenities around the stations: Get instant access to all the citizen amenities situated around the station of your choice like Hotels, Hospitals, Banks, Restaurants, Theaters, Parking, Gas Stations, Auto Repairs etc.

5. Locate the stations nearest to your locations and get instant information on the trains leaving for various destinations.

6. Online map of the network - you can see the actual GPS coordinate based map of the network based on the chosen route.

Please note that real time departures and schedules are sourced directly from Transit Authority. Accuracy of this information depends on their servers. Please treat this app as a tool to estimate your trip timings and schedule, please do not expect 100% accuracy.
recentChanges: Brought the app in line with Google policies
